templates.title: IT Support Request
templates.description: Report IT issues or request technical support
templates.content:
IT Support Request

📋 Request Summary

Issue Title: [Brief description of the IT issue]

Priority Level: 🔴 Critical / 🟡 High / 🟢 Medium / ⚪ Low

Requested By: [Your Name]

Department: [Your Department]

Date Reported: [Current Date]

🔍 Detailed Issue Description

Please provide a comprehensive description of the technical problem you are experiencing. Include what you were trying to accomplish when the issue occurred and any error messages you encountered.

Issue Description:

[Detailed description of the problem - minimum 3-4 sentences]

💻 System Information

System ComponentDetailsVersion/Model
Operating System[Windows 11 / macOS / Linux][Version Number]
Browser/Application[Chrome / Firefox / Safari / Application Name][Version Number]
Device Type[Desktop / Laptop / Mobile / Tablet][Model Number]
Network Connection[Wired / WiFi / VPN][Connection Speed]

🔄 Steps to Reproduce the Issue

Please provide step-by-step instructions to reproduce the problem. This helps our IT team understand and resolve the issue more quickly.

  1. Step 1: [First action taken - be specific]
  2. Step 2: [Second action - include menu paths, buttons clicked]
  3. Step 3: [Third action - mention any data entered]
  4. Step 4: [When the error occurred - describe exactly what happened]

⚠️ Error Messages & Screenshots

Include any error messages, dialog boxes, or unusual behavior you observed. Screenshots are extremely helpful for diagnosis.

Error Details:

Error Code: [If applicable]
Error Message: [Exact error text]
Time of Error: [Timestamp]
Additional Details: [Any other relevant information]

📸 Screenshot Instructions:

Please attach screenshots showing:

  • The error message or unexpected behavior
  • The screen/page where the issue occurs
  • Any relevant system information or settings
  • Before and after states if applicable

📊 Impact Assessment

Impact CategoryLevelDescription
Business Impact[Critical/High/Medium/Low][How this affects business operations]
Users Affected[Number of users][Individual/Team/Department/Company-wide]
Urgency[Immediate/Same Day/This Week/When Possible][Timeline requirements and reasoning]

🔧 Troubleshooting Already Attempted

Please list any troubleshooting steps you have already tried. This prevents duplication of effort and helps identify the root cause faster.

✅ Actions Already Taken:

  • □ Restarted the application
  • □ Restarted the computer
  • □ Cleared browser cache/cookies
  • □ Tried a different browser
  • □ Checked internet connection
  • □ Updated software/drivers
  • □ Contacted vendor support
  • □ Other: [Specify other actions taken]

🎯 Desired Resolution

Please describe what you would like to achieve and any specific requirements or constraints.

Expected Outcome: [What should happen when the issue is resolved]

Acceptable Workarounds: [Any temporary solutions that would be acceptable]

Timeline Requirements: [When you need this resolved and why]

Additional Requirements: [Any other considerations or constraints]

📞 Contact Information

Primary Contact: [Your name and preferred contact method]

Phone: [Your phone number]

Email: [Your email address]

Best Time to Contact: [Preferred time for follow-up]

Alternative Contact: [Backup contact if you're unavailable]

Production Line[Line Number/Name][Normal Capacity][Current Output]

Product/Style[Product Code/Name][Specification Version][Batch/Lot Number]
Order Information[Order Number][Total Quantity][Completed Quantity]
Customer[Customer Name][Delivery Date][Priority Level]

🔍 Detailed Issue Description

Problem Summary

Provide a comprehensive description of the production issue. Include what was happening when the problem was first noticed, any unusual sounds, smells, or visual indicators.

⚙️ Equipment & Machinery Information

Equipment DetailsInformationStatusLast Maintenance
Primary Machine[Machine Model & Serial Number][Operational/Down/Reduced][Date of Last Service]
Operator[Operator Name & ID][Experience Level][Training Date]
Machine Settings[Current Settings][Standard Settings][Last Adjustment]
Supporting Equipment[Auxiliary machines involved][Status of each][Maintenance Schedule]

📊 Quality Impact Assessment

🎯 Quality Metrics

Defect Type:[Specific defect description]
Defect Rate:[Current vs. Standard %]
Affected Quantity:[Number of units]
Quality Grade:[A/B/C/Reject]

📈 Production Impact

Output Reduction:[Percentage decrease]
Time Lost:[Hours/Minutes]
Cost Impact:[Estimated cost]
Delivery Risk:[High/Medium/Low]

🔬 Root Cause Analysis

🎯 Potential Causes Investigation

👥 Human Factors

  • Operator error or inexperience
  • Training inadequacy
  • Fatigue or distraction
  • Communication breakdown
  • Procedure not followed

⚙️ Machine/Equipment

  • Mechanical failure
  • Calibration issues
  • Wear and tear
  • Improper settings
  • Maintenance overdue

🧪 Material/Method

  • Raw material defects
  • Specification changes
  • Process variation
  • Environmental factors
  • Supplier issues

🔍 Primary Root Cause (Best Assessment):

🚀 Immediate Actions Taken

✅ Emergency Response Actions

Action TakenTimeResponsible PersonResult/Status
[First action taken][Time stamp][Person responsible][Outcome]
[Second action taken][Time stamp][Person responsible][Outcome]
[Third action taken][Time stamp][Person responsible][Outcome]

📋 Corrective Action Plan

🎯 Short-term Actions (0-24 hours)

  1. Immediate Fix: [What needs to be done right now]
    Responsible: [Name] | Deadline: [Time]
  2. Quality Check: [Verification steps needed]
    Responsible: [Name] | Deadline: [Time]
  3. Production Resume: [Steps to restart production]
    Responsible: [Name] | Deadline: [Time]

🔧 Medium-term Actions (1-7 days)

  1. Root Cause Investigation: [Detailed analysis required]
    Responsible: [Name] | Deadline: [Date]
  2. Process Improvement: [Changes to prevent recurrence]
    Responsible: [Name] | Deadline: [Date]

🛡️ Long-term Prevention (1-4 weeks)

  1. Training Update: [Staff training requirements]
    Responsible: [Name] | Deadline: [Date]
  2. Procedure Update: [Documentation changes needed]
    Responsible: [Name] | Deadline: [Date]

📞 Escalation & Communication

🚨 Immediate Notifications

  • Production Manager: [Name & Contact]
  • Quality Manager: [Name & Contact]
  • Shift Supervisor: [Name & Contact]
  • Customer Service (if needed): [Contact]

📊 Reporting Schedule

  • Hourly updates until resolved
  • Daily summary report
  • Final incident report within 48 hours
  • Follow-up effectiveness review in 1 week
